content: Golf tournament held in SingaporeGolf tournament The **Singapore Ladies Masters** is a professional [golf](/wiki/Golf) tournament in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore), featured on the [China LPGA Tour](/wiki/China_LPGA_Tour). It is held at Laguna National Golf Resort Club, and was first played in 2023. ## History In July 2023, [Shannon Tan](/wiki/Shannon_Tan) won the inaugural tournament, while still an amateur. She became only the second Singaporean to win on the CLPGA after Amanda Tan won the 2017 Beijing Heritage. Tan also became the first Singaporean golfer to win an international golf tournament since [Mardan Mamat](/wiki/Mardan_Mamat) won the 2006 [Singapore Masters](/wiki/Singapore_Masters). ## Winners YearDateWinnerWinning scoreMargin of victoryRunner-upRef202416 Jun Pang Runzhi−7 (71-66-72=209)1 stroke Cai Danlin20239 Jul [Shannon Tan](/wiki/Shannon_Tan) (a)−10 (68-72-66=206)1 stroke Ji Yu-ai - [Singapore Ladies Open](/wiki/Singapore_Ladies_Open) - Official website
title: Singapore Ladies Masters
